title: Guy Mortier
overview: Guy Mortier has recently turned 80, which is a good opportunity for Canvas to tell the story of the obsessed magazine maker, language virtuoso, witty prankster, Elvis fan, creator and creator of the most popular commercials, radio and TV personality , MC van Torhout/Werchter, de Pop Poll and de Ha van Humo, perfectionist and doubter, friend, brother, father and husband.
